name: v1.24.0 - High Frequency Updates, HNSW Binary Quantization, Support for Multiple Vectors per Class, Durability Improvements, Japanese & Chinese Tokenizers, Improved NotEqual Operator, Telemetry
body:
## Breaking Changes

*none*

## New Features

### High Frequency Updates

Weaviate now has reinforced support for high-frequency updates, enabling tens of millions of updates per day without degrading performance. This improvement involved optimizing the handling of object properties and vector updates. Specifically, updates that do not affect the vector index avoid unnecessary processing, and updates that change vectors are processed much more efficiently. These enhancements are critical for maintaining high performance and scalability in environments with heavy update loads.

* Skip vector reindex by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3963
* Skip re-vectorization of identical/similar objects in a batch by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4163
* Idempotent batch by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4058
* Locks: write-only sharded locks by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4156
* Improved cleaning of tombstones by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4003

### HNSW Binary Quantization

Introducing binary quantization support for the HNSW (Hierarchical Navigable Small World) vector index, marking a significant advancement in the efficiency and performance of vector search operations. This new feature enables the conversion of vectors into compact binary formats, drastically reducing the memory footprint of the vector index while maintaining high search accuracy. The introduction of binary quantization support is a game-changer for applications with large-scale datasets, where memory efficiency is paramount. By leveraging binary quantization, you can now achieve faster search speeds and lower memory usage, making it easier to scale applications without compromising on performance.

* HNSW+BQ by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3841
* Enabling BQ compression through update user config by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3875
* HNSW BQ dimension tracking by @trengrj in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4209

### Support for Multiple Vectors per Class

Hey Weaviate community   we heard you! The [most upvoted feature on the public roadmap](https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/issues/2465) is here!

Support for multiple vectors per class means enhancing Weaviate's flexibility and applicability for complex data models. This feature allows for more nuanced data representation, supporting diverse and multifaceted search and machine learning use cases. By accommodating multiple vectors per class, Weaviate enables richer data indexing and retrieval strategies, improving accuracy and efficiency in search queries and data analysis tasks.

* Introduce class multi-vector support by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4180
* Multiple Vectors: gRPC Batch API vectors by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4246
* Multiple Vectors: Validation of none vectorizer modules when multiple vectorizer configuration is present by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4248
* Return all named vectors if vectors is true by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4253
* Aggregate with named vectors by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4254
* Support for VectorConfig update by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4266
* Summed metrics for target vectors by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4264
* Target vectors marshalling by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4271
* Use Async Queue(s) and VectorIndex(es) only relevant for configured legacy vector or target vectors by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4279
* Hide legacy vector index config when target vectors configured by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4283
* Handle named vectors when checking certainy/distance in queries by @tsmith023 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4285

### Japanese & Chinese Tokenizers

* Tokenizers for Japanese/Chinese by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4028
* Include dictionary files in docker image, add test by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4158

### Durability Improvements

* Use remainder to ensure last batch is indexed by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4063
* Prevent segment inconsistencies by @jeroiraz in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4129
* Backward-compatibility  wal parser by @jeroiraz in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4225
* Delete already compacted segment by @jeroiraz in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4307
* Delete compacted segment metadata by @jeroiraz in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4309

### Improved NotEqual Operator

* Improved `NotEqual` Operator by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4122
* Truncate buffered doc IDs from Searcher by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4275

### Telemetry

* Minimal telemetry in OSS Weaviate by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4097
* Telemetry: updates and safeguards by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4294
* Telemetry: disable for development and CI pipeline by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4218

### Other

* Generic backoff timer to limit any behavior, currently log messages by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3912
* Extend HTTP backup & restore endpoints to allow for custom compression configuration by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3367
* Add restore config object by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4026
* Cleanup scores, search results and DocID by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3849
* Add Go package reference to README by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4111
* Setting default values for weaviate server  by @avirlrma in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4106
* Add nil props to GRPC map by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4135
* Switch hybrid fusion default to relative score fusion by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3939
* Reduce logging message frequency for non-recovered objects  by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4242
* Ignore logging only, not the continue by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4243
* Disable logging in inconsistent object bucket and search bucket entries (1.24) by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4261
* Enable setting additional log levels by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4215

## Fixes

* Resolve race condition in acceptance stress tests by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3938
* Backup assign defaults on paritals config by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4020
* Acceptance test command path and test acceptance on test all  by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4043
* Typo in replication acceptance test in test/run.sh by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4044
* Remove unwanted +1 by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4127
* Qna-transformer acceptance test runners by adding larger runners by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4138
* Compress at the right time by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4238
* Fix checkpoint detection in async mode by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4277
* Batch Delete: Don't fail entire batch when id not found by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4284
* Refactoring compressor by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3880

## Performance Improvements

* Batch Vectorizer by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4147
* Better BM25 benchmarking by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4078
* Improve locking of shared pool by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4258

## Testing Improvements

* Cleanup gha caches after PR merge by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4162
* Move transformers acceptance tests to ubuntu-latest-4-cores by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4173
* Assert eventually gcs backup bucket creation by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4176
* Assert eventually cloud backup bucket creation by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4178
* Fix flaky test with named vectors return order by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4255
* Add backup tests with named vectors by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4281
* Improved class update tests by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4286
* Migration of compression tests to acceptance package by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3923
* Speed acceptance tests and gha by modularizing the running test and parallelize them  by @moogacs in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4017
* Change module acceptance tests to run on ubuntu-latest by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4045
* Add debug weaviate build and related script to use remote delve by @reyreaud-l in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4051

## New Contributors
* @avirlrma made their first contribution in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4106
* @jeroiraz made their first contribution in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4129

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/compare/v1.23.10...v1.24.0

name: v1.24.0-rc.1 - High Frequency Updates, HNSW Binary Quantization, Support for Multiple Vectors per Class, Durability Improvements, Japanese & Chinese Tokenizers, Improved NotEqual Operator, Telemetry
body:
This is a release candidate for the upcoming v1.24.0 release
A release candidate (RC) means the release is considered feature complete and has finished beta-testing. Any issues discovered during the RC phase will lead to new rc releases. The final rc release becomes the stable release. We're happy for your feedback about this pre-release.

### This pre-release contains:
* Optimizations for high frequency updates
* Binary quantization support for the HNSW vector index type
* Support for multiple vectors per class
* Durability improvements surrounding disk segments and the Write-Ahead Log
* Tokenisers for Japanese/Chinese
* Improved NotEqual Operator
* Minimal telemetry

### What's Changed Since [v1.24.0-rc.0](https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/releases/tag/v1.24.0-rc.0):
* Fix gRPC Batch API vectors pass by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4246
* Fix validation of none vectorizer modules when multiple vectorizer configuration is present by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4248

* Enable setting additional log levels by @amourao in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4215
* Improve locking of shared pool by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4258
* Support for VectorConfig update by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4266
* Summed metrics for target vectors by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4264
* Target vectors marshalling by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4271
* Fix: Truncate buffered doc IDs from Searcher by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4275
* Fix checkpoint detection in async mode by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4277
* Use Async Queue(s) and VectorIndex(es) only relevant for configured legacy vector or target vectors by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4279

* hide legacy vector index config when target vectors configured by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4283
* Batch Delete: Don't fail entire batch when id not found by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/4284

A release candidate (RC) means the release is considered feature complete and has finished beta-testing. Any issues discovered during the RC phase will lead to new rc releases. The final rc release becomes the stable release. We're happy for your feedback about this pre-release.

This pre-release contains:
* Optimizations for high frequency updates
* Binary quantization support for the HNSW vector index type
* Support for multiple vectors per class
* Durability improvements surrounding disk segments and the Write-Ahead Log
* Tokenisers for Japanese/Chinese
* Improved NotEqual Operator
* Minimal telemetry

name: v1.23.0 - Binary quantization support, Startup time improvements, New Generative Anyscale module, gRPC API performance improvements
body:
## Breaking Changes

### Nodes Status Response Verbosity

Getting the status for all nodes in a cluster can be a very expensive query when each node contains a large number of shards, as the metadata for each shard is included in the response. A new output verbosity option sets the default verbosity level to `minimal`, omitting individual shard metadata. The new `verbose` verbosity output level includes shard metadata, so using this will return a response body identical to the previous nodes status response before this release.

* Add output verbosity option to Nodes API  by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3864

## New Features

### Binary Quantization / Brute Force Index

Exciting news! We've added a brute force search feature that efficiently runs straight from disk. You can choose between using original vectors or binary compression for faster processing and less disk read. Currently, compression is best for specific data types, but stay tuned! We're working towards a cool update where, with compression enabled, we'll mix disk and memory operations for even better performance. This awesome enhancement is on the horizon, so keep an eye out! 

* Binary quantization & brute force index type by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3690

### Startup Time / MTTR Improvements

Previously our mean time to recovery (MTTR) / node startup time was significantly impacted by nodes which contain a large number of shards or tenants. This is because the database had to synchronously load each shard from disk before startup was complete and the requests were ready to be served. Well, say goodbye to those days! 

We've introduced an amazing new feature: a lazy-loaded shard abstraction layer. This game-changer drastically speeds up node startup and recovery times. How? By loading shards in the background without blocking startup. This means your nodes are up and running almost instantly - talk about efficiency!

And here's the best part: if a request hits for a shard that's not yet loaded, Weaviate smartly fetches it on the spot, serving the request right away. The rest of the shards continue to load in the background seamlessly. This is a huge leap forward in performance and responsiveness. So, gear up to experience a smoother, faster, and more efficient DB.

* Lazy load shards to improve startup time, and conserve resources by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3783
* Lazy load shards (part 2) by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3830
* Lazy load shards (part 3) by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3859
* Add metrics for shard lazy loading/unloading by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3893

### Auto-Compression

The introduction of Product Quantization (PQ) was a huge step forward in efficient vector operations. And now, we're pushing the envelope even further with auto-compression.

Here's the deal: when your in-memory vector index hits a certain threshold, PQ kicks in automatically, compressing the index. This means smarter, smoother, and super-efficient handling of your data without lifting a finger.

* Automatically trigger index compression after threshold by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3771

### Modules

* Generative Anyscale Module by @CShorten in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3845
* Adding Mixtral-8x7B-Instruct-v0.1 by @CShorten in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3913
* Add support for Google's Gemini model by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3891
* Adjust generateContent API call for Gemini model by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3911
* Add support for new 002 and 003 Gecko models by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3905

### Resource Guardrails

* Set resource limits to prevent the server going  OOM or swapping worker threads by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3731

### Performance Optimizations

* Removes tombstones when merging with root segment by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3666
* Add option to force compactions every cycle, where it is advantageous by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3675
* Improve Cursor Performance by reusing memory by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3660
* Improvement of stop condition within SearchByVectorDistance by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3742
* Improved filtered flat search stop condition by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3753
* Optional bloom filter and  count net additions calculations by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3756
* Implement pread for replace strategy cursor by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3727
* Setting optimal segments on default, based on the dimensions by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3790
* Send uuid as a byte by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3894

### gRPC Improvements
* Add config and support for gRPC TLS credentials by @mikewyer in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3794
* Add filter for metadata to GRPC by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3861
* Introduce custom `pb.Properties` message to contain type-aware properties within search result by @tsmith023 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3820
* Add support for geo coordinates in GRCP by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3883
* Introduce `ReturnAllNonrefProperties` bool to `PropertiesRequest` by @tsmith023 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3899

### Nodes API

* Add output verbosity option to Nodes API  by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3864
* Add compressed to NodeShardStatus by @trengrj in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3806

### Internal System Restructuring

* Restructure internal file structure to align with the class structure by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3719
* Migration of brute force index's buckets to main store by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3740
* Unification of compressed vectors bucket names by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3865
* Merge PQ bucket into shard store, migrate PQ files from flat file structure by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3726

### Other

* Restores cleanup tombstones on compaction tests by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3710
* Removing hnsw config dependency by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3738
* Validating user config by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3754
* Defining constants once by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3755
* Add Github issue template by @dudanogueira in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3766
* Change Google Cloud Storage tests to use prebuilt docker image by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3854
* Improve Weaviate's e2e test pipelines by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3871
* Generic priority queue by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3877
* Refactor all `lsmkv` error equality checks to use `errors.Is` by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3900
* Exclude vendor and temporary directories in the swagger script by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3904

## Fixes

* Flat index refactor/fixes by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3724
* TypeAssertVectorIndex fix to work with hnsw and flat index by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3736
* Fix clusterapi comms when gRPC searching required UUID only by @tsmith023 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3747
* Improvements of HNSW locks by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3784
* Flat index fix: rescoreLimit by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3884
* Fixes for GRPC filters by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3888
* Secure access to consistency level during batch deletes by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3869
* Fix filtering on array types with GRPC by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3892
* Enhance backup procedure for replicated classes by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3889
* Fix batch deletions when replication is enabled by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3919

## New Contributors
* @dudanogueira made their first contribution in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3766
* @mikewyer made their first contribution in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3794

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/compare/v1.22.6...v1.23.0

name: v1.22.0 - Async Indexing, Nested Object Support, gRPC API Support, Schema Repair, OIDC Group Auth, and many other improvements & fixes
body:
## Breaking Changes
*none*

## New Features

### Async Indexing
Support for asynchronous indexing is now available!  This feature is experimental, and opt-in. To use it, set the environment variable `ASYNC_INDEXING=true`. With this, Weaviate now offers you the option de-coupling vector indexing from object creation. You can enable this to optimize imports for speed where vector indexing is not required immediately.

* Share workers between queues by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3590
* Index stale queue items by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3591
* Add new shard INDEXING state by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3596
* Graceful shutdown by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3625
* Skip indexed vectors at startup by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3568
* Fix brute force search with cosine distance by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3636
* Improve import time using leaky bucket strategy by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3642
* Add async acceptance test workflow by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3652
* Update REST API to allow for broadcasting of shard statuses by @tsmith023 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3673
* Add `vectorQueueSize` to `/schema/{className}/shards` response by @tsmith023 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3682
* Introduce async indexing by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3424

### Nested Object Support
You asked for it, now you have it! Store full objects directly into Weaviate. Have unexpected or dynamic object properties? No problem, nested object support is supported by autoschema as well, meaning the schema will be updated dynamically according to object properties.

* Add support for `object`/`object[]` data types by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3600
* Autoschema improvements by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3626
* Run autoschema on object's update/merge allowing creating new props or nested props by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3641

### gRPC API Support
Weaviate now officially supports gRPC, significantly improving transport efficiency! The easiest way to take advantage of this feature is to use one of the [official language clients](https://weaviate.io/developers/weaviate/client-libraries). Please note that if you were using gRPC beforehand, you will need to upgrade to use the latest gRPC services.

* Implement gRPC health check by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3587
* Split protofiles into v0 and v1 packages for clear API break by @tsmith023 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3639
* Implement gRPC Nested Objects by @tsmith023 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3601
* Adjust gRPC Java package name by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3665

### Schema Repair
* Repair schema when cluster is out of sync by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3575

### Module Enhancements
* Add gpt-3.5-turbo-instruct to available qna-openai models by @xysun in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3574
* Add support for vectorizing `text[]` props in `multi2vec-bind` by @tsmith023 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3654
* Add support for vectorizing `text[]` props in `multi2vec-clip` by @tsmith023 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3653

### Performance Optimizations
* Improve Startup Time by initializing Shards in parallel by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3658
* Improve Shutdown speed by shutting down shards in parallel by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3661
* Removes tombstones when merging with root segment by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3666
* Add memory guard rails for batch creation by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3582

### OIDC Group Auth
* OIDC group authentication support by @doublefelix7 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3581

### Other
* Refactor core object to allow scripting by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3612
* Add help command to test run script by @reyreaud-l in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3628
* Modify ContainsAny / All tests to run also in cluster setup by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3678
* Backup restore add node_mapping parameter by @reyreaud-l in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3602



## Fixes
* Refactor beacon parsing in reference target autodetection by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3420
* Fix flaky test of cycle callbacks by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3404
* Disallow changes to distance setting after creating a class by @nilskulawiak in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3376
* Remove superfluous backup read locks by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3492
* Bump dev prometheus, add host metrics dashboard by @trengrj in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3491
* Adds ContainsAny/All tests for text properties by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3498
* Add `needs-investigation` to don't-close list by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3511
* Fix panic with negative value of `k` by @amityahav in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3512
* Enable unused, nolintlint; fix lint issues by @alexandear in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3531
* Fix typos in comments and tests by @alexandear in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3530
* Fix: unhandled batch delete error by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3549
* Hnsw: turn neurips23 test into benchmark by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3393
* Set missing name attribute in workflow files by @aduis in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3578
* Make proto naming consistent by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3576
* Update docker compose doc link by @cedarkuo in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3330
* Fix vectorization of concepts in nearText argument by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3494
* Fix gRPC Batch API AutoSchema by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3657
* Fix for GraphQL ref search between MT and non-MT classes by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3679

## New Contributors
* @amityahav made their first contribution in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3512
* @aduis made their first contribution in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3578

name: v1.22.0-rc.0 - Support for object / object[] properties, gRPC API support, Schema improvements
body:
This is a release candidate for the upcoming v1.22.0 release
A release candidate (RC) means the release is considered feature complete and has finished beta-testing. Any issues discovered during the RC phase will lead to new rc releases. The final rc release becomes the stable release. We're happy for your feedback about this pre-release.

This pre-release contains:
* Support for `object` / `object[]` data types
* gRPC API support for Search and Batch Imports
* Schema improvements - repair mechanism
* New node mapping parameter in backups API
* Auto schema improvements

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/compare/v1.21.7...v1.22.0-rc.0

name: v1.21.0 - Contains Operators, pread, backup compression, Import Performance, Inactive Tenants, and much more!
body:
v1.21.0 - Contains Operators, pread, backup compression, Import Performance, Inactive Tenants, and much more!

## Breaking Changes
*none*

## New Features

### `ContainsAny` / `ContainsAll` operators
New filter operators that allow for easier filters with array types or matching one of (or all of) words in tokenized text.

* ContainsAny & ContainsAll Filter Operators by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3370

### Backup Compression
Backups can now be compressed into pre-configureable chunks and require much fewer file operations. This reduces costs on S3/GCS/etc and improves the speed of backups:

* Enhanced backup efficiency and configurability with compression techniques by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3327

### Add ability to deactive tenants (experimental)
An inactive tenant does not consume any resources. This allows for hosting more tenants on the same node as long as not all tenants are active at the same time.

* Activated deactivated tenants by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3353
* Activate / deactivate tenant improvements by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3378

### Support Pread (as alternative to Mmap) in LSM store
Improves performance and stability on disk-bound setups. Opt-in for now, will become opt-out in a future relase:

* Add option to use pread instead of mmap for LSM store access by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3254

### Performance Improvements
* hnsw: add neon simd support to l2 and dot product by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3215
* Single cyclemanager of type per class. Shard's cycle callbacks grouped in containers by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3306
* Cycle manager per class p2 by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3326
* Missing callback unregister by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3359
* Reduce indexing time due to lock contention by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3186

### New Modules
* Introduce text2vec-gpt4all module by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3361
* Introduce multi2vec-bind module by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3292

### Other
* Batch support in reranker transformers by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3279
* Enforce minimum replication factor according to system-wide config by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3352
* Configurable nested cross reference query limit by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3281
* Add batch queue congestion info to node status by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3372
* Add missing features to GRPC by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3323
* Add grpc batching by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3400
* Enable references without ToClass in object creation by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3365

## Fixes

* Ensure proper vector sync to target nodes during read repair by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3280
* fix langchain doc link by @zwpaper in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3257
* Fix missing tenant by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3331
* Fix optional unmarshaling of object when dealing with large vector dimensions (up to 65k) by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3354
* Fixing bug detected by the chaos pipeline by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3375
* close the indexCounter file before removal by @tsmith023 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3387
* Catch panics during hnsw delete cleanup by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3389
* pq: implement cache miss logic by @asdine in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3335
* Catch panics during hnsw delete cleanup by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3390
* Fix get requests with classname and include by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3394
* Prevent deadlock from malformed tx payload in cluster api by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3402

### Internal / Refactoring / Dev Tooling / Other

* Update backup related go dependencies to newest versions by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3259
* Upgrade docker client dependency to enable successful tests using go1.20.6 and testcontainers by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3299
* Add support for compilation on windows by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3295
* Update github actions to be able to run with latest go version by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3300
* Bump Templum/govulncheck-action from 0.10.1 to 1.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3287
* Update testcontainers lib to solve bug with go1.20.6 by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3350
* Remove Not operator from where filter by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3360
* Add class to proppair by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3304

## New Contributors
* @zwpaper made their first contribution in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3257
* @tsmith023 made their first contribution in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3387

name: v1.21.0-rc.1 - Improved Batch Importing
body: Contains everything from `v1.21.0-rc.0` + improvements around batch importing to remove lock contention.

name: v1.21.0-rc.0 - Activate / deactivate tenants, LSM pread access, cycle manager and backup optimizations, new modules and Windows support
body:
This is a release candidate for the upcoming v1.21.0 release
A release candidate (RC) means the release is considered feature complete and has finished beta-testing. Any issues discovered during the RC phase will lead to new rc releases. The final rc release becomes the stable release. We're happy for your feedback about this pre-release.

This pre-release contains:
* Added option to use pread instead of mmap for LSM store access 
* Cycle manager improvements
* Activate / deactivate tenants feature
* Enhanced backup efficiency and configurability with compression techniques
* Added support for compilation on windows
* New text2vec-gpt4all and multi2vec-bind modules

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/compare/v1.20.5...v1.21.0-rc.0

name: v1.20.0 - Multi-Tenancy, Rerankers, PQ General Availability, & more
body:
## Breaking Changes
*none*

## New Features

### Native Multi-Tenancy supporting millions of tenants
Strong isolation between tenants, scales linearly with more tenants. 50,000+ tenants per node, millions of tenants with billions of objects in a multi-node cluster. [Read more](https://weaviate.io/blog/multi-tenancy-vector-search).

* Enable multi-tenancy for new classes by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3002
* Initial implementation for adding new tenants to existing classes  by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3022
* Expose endpoint for creating new tenants in a multi-tenant class by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3024
* Fix schema persistence when adding new tenants by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3032
* Support for single tenant object CRUD by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3054
* Support remaining single tenant object operations by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3058
* Improve resilience of adding tenants by implementing commit and rollback mechanism (part 2) by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3057
* Tenant object batch operations support by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3065
* Enable metrics for classes with multi-tenancy enabled by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3081
* Optimise shard name determination during batch insert by avoiding unnecessary copying of the sharding state by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3082
* Enforce tenant object separation and tenant key immutability by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3070
* Adjust the backup and restoration process to accommodate multi-tenant classes by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3084
* Fix backup tests to abide by new tenant key enforcement rules by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3108
* Optimise shard name determination during batch operations by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3125
* Multi-tenancy support for GQL Get{} queries by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3105
* Multi-tenancy support for GQL Aggregate{} queries by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3143
* Replication support for multi-tenant classes by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3161
* Extend nodes API for multi-tenant classes by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3152
* Enforce tenant isolation when creating references by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3160
* Implement support for deleting tenants of a specific class by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3174
* Add tenant to object and batchReference by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3181
* Unifies regexes for className and shardName/tenantKey by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3178
* Mmt improvements follow up by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3189
* Listing support for multi-tenant classes by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3172
* Renames tenant related vars by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3190
* Implement in-place sharding state update for new tenant additions by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3191
* Move tenant out of singleRef by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3192
* Return error when duplicate tenants are created by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3194
* Use tenant names in delete by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3196
* Fix nearObject and nearText with tenant by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3197
* Aggregate with nearobject and tenant by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3200
* Optimize queuing for local shard during search and batch operations by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3199
* Add get tenants endpoint by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3202
* Optimise Sharding State Querying by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3209
* Concurrent shard restoration from backup by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3221
* Fix validation of multi tenancy configuration by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3225

### Autocut & Better Fusion

Automatically cut off unrelated results. Use a better fusion algorithm to improve result quality in hybrid search.


* Autocut for bm25 by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2960
* Add autocut and relative score ranking algo to hybrid search by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3140
* Add autocut to nearVector, nearObject and nearXXX by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3175
* Fix hybrid with autocut and no limit by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3210
* Implemented concurrent shard backup and added default retry policies for storage modules by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3208
* Multi tenancy client acceptance tests by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3193
* Fix multiple issues with MultiTenancy disabled by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3219

### PQ General Availability

PQ is now generally available and much better than ever thanks to various improvement and the ability to dynamically rescore results.

* Pq optimization after rescoring by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3098
* Pq training limit by @trengrj in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3106
* Pq optimization after rescoring by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3146

### Reranker

Improve result quality even further with re-rankers. Not just one, but two rerankers modules are introduced with this release.

* Introduce reranker-transformers module by @CShorten in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3121
* Introduce reranker-cohere module by @CShorten in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3122
* Cohere reranker: handle err in getScore by @trengrj in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3230
* Fix error handling in reranker-cohere module by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3234

### Status Code Metrics

Better observability for request success and failure rates

* Metrics for Status Codes: OK vs User Error vs Server Error by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3195

### Other

* Enhance schema persistence capability to selectively persist schema changes by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3118
* Switch to golang 1.20 by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3176
* Rename metrics grouping (old name still works) by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3222
* Ensure thread-safety when reading the schema by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3235


## Fixes

* Prevent hybrid and bm25 search from being used with sort by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2921
* Refactor disk usage retrieval during node gossip to async operation by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3086
* Update OpenAI URL in module's meta.go by @dandv in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3184
* Fix data race in commit logger by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3214
* Add TestCombineVectorsWithWeights tests. by @ttsugriy in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3148
* Fix nil pointer in Explore queries with module near<Media> arguments by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3223
* Fix data race in binary search tree by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3231
* Better error message for unknown replication level by @Sasmuin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3151

### Internal / DX / CI / Refactor / Testing / etc
* Introduce release artifact build script by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3037
* Refactor Huggingface module url by @gmanninglive in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3051
* Disable Vulnerability-Scanning step for forked PR's by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3061
* Add many module enabled tests by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3075
* Module components: Refactor img2vec-neural and generative modules by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3077
* [README] minor updates by @databyjp in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3112
* Bump github.com/docker/distribution from 2.8.1+incompatible to 2.8.2+incompatible by @dependabot in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3010
* Bump github.com/docker/distribution from 2.8.1+incompatible to 2.8.2+incompatible in /test/acceptance_with_go_client by @dependabot in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3009
* Reuse sums memory for combined vector result. by @ttsugriy in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3046
* [combine][perf] Use more efficient way to compute dividers. by @ttsugriy in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3155
* [distance][perf] Use fewer math.Sqrt calls. by @ttsugriy in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3154
* [ratelimiter][perf] Use non-blocking rate limiter. by @ttsugriy in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3156
* Removes unnecessary rand.Seed by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3220
* Fix unbounded concurrency issue in MT class search by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3226
* Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.47.0 to 1.53.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3227
* Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.47.0 to 1.53.0 in /test/acceptance_with_go_client by @dependabot in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3228
* Fix flaky test by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3233
* Updates client version, adjusts tests by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3224

## New Contributors
* @gmanninglive made their first contribution in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3051
* @ttsugriy made their first contribution in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3046
* @CShorten made their first contribution in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3121
* @Sasmuin made their first contribution in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/3151

body:
## Breaking Changes
*none*

## New Features

## Fixes

name: v1.19.0 - Grouping API, Text Bitmap Filters & better tokenization, Generative Cohere Module & more
body:
# Breaking Changes
*none*

However, keep in mind that after upgrading to v1.19 a downgrade to v1.18 will no longer be supported. If you anticipate having to downgrade, please create a backup before upgrading!

# New Features

## Group by arbitrary prop
See the [Proposal](https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/issues/2602) for context on this new feature.
* Group by arbitrary prop (including ref), return top k per group by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2872

## Deprecate `string` type, add tokenization options to `text`
See the [Proposal](https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/issues/2751) for context on this change.

* Deprecates `string(Array)` data type, enriches `text(Array)` tokenization options by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2875
* Migrates property's IndexInverted to IndexFilterable + IndexSearchable by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2937
* Creates missing RBM inverted index for text/text[] props on v1.18 to 1.19 migration  by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2936
* Filter cache cleanup by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2958
* Hash buckets cleanup by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2959
* IndexFilterable & IndexSearchable UX improvements by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2984

## New Module: `generative-cohere`
* New module: generative-cohere by @byronvoorbach in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2600

## Tunable Consistency for Searches
* Add tunable consistency to GraphQL `Get` queries by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2781
* Check consistency for GQL search results by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2902
* GQL handler consistency level integration by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2883

## `uuid` and `uuid[]` prop types
* Add `uuid` and `uuid[]` prop types (indexed with roaring bitmaps) by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2739

## Minimal grpc API (expiremental)
* Minimal gRPC API with support for Search endpoint by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2912
* [Performance] Restructure hnsw connection list pooling by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2933
* [Performance][grpc] Small performance improvements for id-only queries  by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2928

# Fixes
* Update contextionary dependency to v1.2.0 version by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2731
* fixed typos by @Deegiimurun in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2886

* quoted ports in docker-compose by @Deegiimurun in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2888
* fix typo in CONTRIBUTING.md by @ankschoubey in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2878
* fixed typo by @Deegiimurun in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2893
* Prometheus: Instead of hardcoding value, listen on configurable port by @npunati27 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2873
* hybrid search exposes error by @Deegiimurun in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2922
* Json prop tracker by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2867
* Report to log when contextionary can't be contacted by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2760
* Fix: reject class name casing permutations by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2943
* Fix: prevent panic when backup request contains case permutation of existing class by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2944

* Skip lost object in BM25 by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2956

name: v1.18.0 - Bitmap Indexing, HNSW-PQ, Hybrid Filters, Cursors, Tunable Consistency
body:
# Breaking Changes
*none*

# New Features

## Faster Filtering through Bitmap Indexing (`RoaringSet`) for non-text props
This release introduces bitmap indexing for much faster filtering of any non-text property. In some [extreme cases](https://twitter.com/etiennedi/status/1621180332782374912?s=20), the speed up is over 1,000x.

This change is non-breaking. Old datasets will continue to work using the old mechanism. There is also an option to perform a zero downtime migration, during which Weaviate will be in read-only mode.

* Native Roaring Bitmap support in LSM Store by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2515
* Migration of inverted index buckets of collection set to roaring set strategy by @aliszka in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2690

## HNSW-PQ (Product Quantization for reduced memory footprint)
Optionally compress vectors using Product Quantization while still using HNSW.  This combination brings the best of both worlds; depending on configuration the overall memory footprint can drop 25%, 50%, or even 75% percent, while still offering great performance and recall. Check this blogpost (coming soon) for details on the respective trade-offs.

* Hnsw pq by @abdelr in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2592

## BM25 WAND Algorithm & Performance Improvements
BM25 scoring (originally introduced in v1.17) was reworked to use a Weak-AND (WAND) algorithm. In addition, further performance improvements were applied.  Now BM25 scoring is considerably faster than in v1.18. In some cases more than 10x faster.

* Add simple bm25 benchmark by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2581
* Bm25 with WAND by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2583
* Add Bm25 stopwords by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2689
* Bm25: only add additonal explanations when requested by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2721
* Concurrently run BM25 search terms by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2706

## BM25 & Hybrid Search `where` filters
While v1.17 introduced both BM25 and Hybrid Search, one limitation was that `where` filters could not be combined with either of those options. Now they can.

* Add filters to bm25 by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2648
* Hybrid filters by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2670

## Replication: Tunable Consistency
V1.17 introduced Replication support, however, not all write and read endpoints supported tunable consistency yet. They do now.

* Set tunable consistency for replicated writes by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2542
* Extend checking for object existence with tunable consistency by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2559
* Introduce getting batch objects with tunable consistency by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2568
* Extend http write endpoints with consistency level by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2597
* Additional tunable consistency support for objects PUT, HEAD by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2674
* Return whenever data has been replicated depending on the specified consistency level by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2679
* Change default consistency level from ALL to QUORUM by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2726
* Log replication errors when writing or reading objects by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2725

## Replication: Automatic Repair on Read
If Weaviate detects an inconsistency between two or more replicas, it will now automatically repair those inconsistencies if possible. No user action is required other than querying the "broken" object with a high enough consistency level.

* Repair on read remote index client implementation by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2574
* Introduce objects digest to optimize replicated object reads by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2603
* Define client interface used during read repair strategy by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2630
* Detection of deleted objects during read repair by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2623
* Implement read repair mechanism when reading single as well as multiple objects by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2643
* Read repair integration tests by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2645
* Implement read repair mechanism when checking existence of single objects by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2661
* Concurrent read repairs depending on the consistency level by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2672
* Improve conflict detection when a target object has been already updated to most recent state by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2685

## Export all objects using Cursor API
Previously users would run into a the `QUERY_MAXIMUM_RESULTS` limit when trying to export all objects out of Weaviate. Alternatively they had to build their own paging workaround using `where` filters. With the new Cursor API it is easy to extract all objects. The cost per "page" is constant regardless of scale.

* Scroll through every object in a class using an id cursor by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2615

## New Module: Azure Backups Provider
In addition to `GCS` and AWS `S3`, Weaviate now supports Azure Cloud Storage as a backup destination.

* Create Azure backup module by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2711

# Fixes

## Security
* Bump github.com/opencontainers/runc from 1.0.2 to 1.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2525
* Bump github.com/docker/distribution from 2.7.1+incompatible to 2.8.0+incompatible by @dependabot in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2523
* Bump github.com/containerd/containerd from 1.5.9 to 1.5.16 by @dependabot in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2524
* Dependabot fixes by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2544
* Bump github.com/containerd/containerd from 1.5.16 to 1.5.18 by @dependabot in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2644
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.4.0 to 0.7.0 in /test/benchmark_bm25 by @dependabot in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2658

## Other
* Readme refresh by @databyjp in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2538
* change go imports to new org name by @etiennedi in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2546

* Update to new logo by @bobvanluijt in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2551

* Use different tokenisation for text and string by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2552
* Move traverser.GetParams to types/dto.GetParams by @donomii in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2589

* Reduce prometheus metrics by @trengrj in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2605
* Add missing calls to file.Close() by @alexandear in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2655
* `backup-gcs:` add `BACKUP_GCS_USE_AUTH` env var to allow other forms of authentication by @iamcaleberic in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2628
* Remove references to contextionary in response from root endpoint by @hsm207 in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2495
* Renaming semi => Weaviate by @dirkkul in https://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/pull/2664

name: v1.18.0-rc.0 - Bitmap Indexing, HNSW-PQ, Hybrid Filters, Cursors, Tunable Consistency
body:
**This is a release candidate for the upcoming `v1.18.0` release**
A release candidate (RC) means the release is considered feature complete and has finished beta-testing. Any issues discovered during the RC phase will lead to new rc releases. The final rc release becomes the stable release. We're happy for your feedback about this pre-release.

This pre-release contains:
* Bitmap indexing for non-text properties, leading to much faster filters
* Experimental support for HNSW-PQ, leading to compressed vectors with lower memory requirements
* WAND-Support for BM25 (faster scoring)
* Filter support for BM25 + Hybrid Search
* Cursor API, which allows you to export every object from Weaviate
* Tunable Consistency (Replication) for many REST endpoints, automatic repair-on-read if inconsistencies are detected

name: v1.17 - Replication, Hybrid Search, and more
body:
# Breaking Changes
*none*

# New Features

## Leaderless Replication
Weaviate v1.17 introduces leaderless replication with tunable consistency. With replication, Weaviate becomes **highly available** and can be scaled to **increase throughput**. Imports can be automatically replicated across the cluster. Existing datasets can be scaled up to allow for higher read-throughput and fail-safety. 

To learn more about the architecture behind Weaviate's leaderless replication, how to use replication, what limitations there are, and what the future roadmap looks like, please see [the documentation](https://weaviate.io/developers/weaviate/current/replication-architecture/).

Contributed by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2344, by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2361, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2362, by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2365, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2371, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2373, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2377, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2380, by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2382, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2384, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2389, by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2395, by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2420, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2418, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2446, by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2447, by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2463, by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2461, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2464, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2399, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2415, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2402, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2417, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2437, by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2426
 
## Hybrid Search (Dense Vector & BM25F)
Weaviate v1.17 introduces the ability to perform a hybrid search consisting of a BM25(F) and dense vector search. The results are combined using rank fusion. In addition to Hybrid Search, Weaviate now also supports pure BM25 and BM25F search. 

To learn more about [Hybrid Search](https://weaviate.io/developers/weaviate/current/graphql-references/vector-search-parameters.html#hybrid) and [BM25 Search](https://weaviate.io/developers/weaviate/current/graphql-references/vector-search-parameters.html#bm25), see the documentation.

Contributed by @donomii in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2319, by @donomii in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2381, by @donomii in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2450, by @donomii in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2467, by @aliszka in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2469, by @aliszka in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2468, by @donomii in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2466, by @donomii in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2391


## Other Features
* Dynamically Add Nodes To Running Cluster after data has been imported by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2350
* Make startup cluster schema sync backward-compatible by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2413
* Add TTLs to cluster-wide transactions (Schema, Classifications) by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2364
* Adjust Memtable Size Dynamically by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2425

# Fixes

## Performance
* Improve Startup Time by persisting more LSM Segment Information by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2385
* Improve p9999 Batch Import Latency by precomputing segment metadata for newly compacted segments by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2421
* Improve HNSW startup time by improving allocation efficiency in Deserializer by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2392

## UX
* UX: No error message on empty schema by @trengrj in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2345
* Updated contributor guide by @databyjp in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2353
* Update README.md by @erika-cardenas in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2354
* Fix "schema out of sync" error when upgrading to v1.17 by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2419
* nit: Improve GitHub Community Standards Score by @MarcusSorealheis in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2409


## Other / Internal / Security
* Bugfix: created and last updated timestamps missing from reference additional fields by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2342
* Fix typos by @trengrj in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2374
* Add Go-specific Vulnerability Scanner by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2379
* misc: fix typo in indexTimestamps prop name by @dandv in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2396
* Fix broken logger in tx manager by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2411
* update go/x/net version by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2427
* Change references from Travis to GitHub actions in PR summary by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2422
* Add Codeowners file by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2404
* Run docker push step on larger machine by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2435
* Fix file descriptor leak in compaction pre-compute by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2440


## New Contributors
* @databyjp made their first contribution in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2353
* @erika-cardenas made their first contribution in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2354

name: v1.16 - Distributed Backups, Null Prop Indexing, New & Improved Modules, and much more
body:
## Breaking Changes
*none*

## New Features

### Null Property & Prop Length Indexing & Filtering
It is now possible to efficiently filter for all props that are set, not set, or have a specific length. Note that null-state and prop-length indexing is optional and needs to be activated prior to importing data.
* Add filtering for null properties by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2209
* Add property length indexing and filtering by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2236

### Distributed Backups
`v1.15` introduced one-command backups, but they were limited to single-node setups. `v1.16` lifts this limitation, and backups now work for distributed (multi-node) setups as well. Old backups, created in `v1.15` are backward-compatible. 
* Add new type coordinator to coordinate distributed backup operation among shards by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2231
* Implement the coordinator selector by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2243
* Get node name from sharding state by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2241
* Implement shard's endpoints used to coordinate creation of a distributed backup by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2246
* Implement endpoints of a shard participating in a coordinated backup restoration by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2250
* Backup: query status of a shard participating in the creation of a coordinated backup by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2251
* Implement endpoints for communication between coordinator and shards by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2248
* Assign backup operations to coordinators (part 1) by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2254
* Multinode backup integration testing preparation by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2252
* Implement schedulers endpoint for getting the status of a backup request. by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2257
* Introduce coordinated cluster backup integration tests by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2259
* Implement schedulers endpoint for getting the status of a restoration request by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2261
* Backup manager get node name from schema manager by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2266
* Implement schedulers endpoint for restoring distributed backups by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2267
* Bind restful backup API to the scheduler to allow for execution distributed backup operations by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2268
* Fix acceptance tests for the backup journey by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2270
* Cluster backup/restore module journey tests by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2273
* Make distributed backups backward compatible with existing single node backups by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2277
* Fix restoring empty classes and returning status of a restoration request by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2280
* Backwards compatibility bug fixes for backup/restore operations by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2286
* Fix backup restoration race condition by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2289
* Fix single-node backups to work without needing cluster env vars by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2295
* Prevent cluster BRO when backend is local filesystem by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2298
* Cancel restoration when failing to store initial metadata in the specified backend. by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2326


### Modules
* Introduce the ref2vec-centroid module by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2205
* Mark all shards as read-only if memory threshold is reached by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2232
* Change to OpenAI embedding API by @samos123 in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2306
* Create text2vec-cohere module by @DasithEdirisinghe in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2323
* Add support for HuggingFace Inference API by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2328
* Add support for experimental multilingual-2210-alpha cohere model by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2332

### UX & Operations 
* Add API to view cluster nodes status by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2249
  * Renames nodes status response by @aliszka in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2284
* Added support for OpenID scopes setting by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2275
* Allow creating class schema with references to itself by @aliszka in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2317
* Add default vector distance metric by @adlerfaulkner in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2300


## Fixes
* Remove certainty deprecation warning by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2244
* Performance: Reduce allocations when unmarshalling properties  by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2269
* Fix vector_index_size metric by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2321
* Fix data race by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2288
* Fix empty references bug by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2320

### Other / Internal / Refactoring / Improved Testing
* Remove unused code to make it easier to navigate the code base by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2235
* Fix inverted index test compilation error by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2242
* Track vector dimensions in inverted index by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2230
* Fix tracking vector dimensions metric when index gets dropped by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2255
* Fix for handling stopping of the tracking vector dimensions goroutine by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2258
* Enable aggregation integration tests with filters by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2265
* Run PR tests as github actions by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2272
* Migrate all tests to GH actions by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2287
* Fixes cyclemanager flaky tests by @aliszka in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2294
* Add a migration option to fill dimensions stored index at startup by @donomii in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2264
* Migrate swagger check to Github action by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2293
* Add tests for empty references by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2312
* Adjust deprecations generation script and remove the timestamp information by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2314
* Adds exhaustive linter by @aliszka in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2309
* Fix syntax in error message by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2315
* Remove vector_index_dimensions_total metric in favor of using vector_dimensions_sum metric by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2325
* Fix releasing resources associated with time.Ticker in the code base by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2327

### Fixes since v1.15.0

Not every user upgrades whenever a patch is released. The following fixes were already included in `v1.15.x` patch releases. If you haven't upgraded since `v1.15.0`, these will be new to you:

* Fix total of 6 bugs related to indexing into LSM Store and HNSW index by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2191
* Fix potential SEGFAULT on concurrent nested filter and hash bucket compaction by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2212
* Fix issues with sorting when multiple properties are set by @aliszka in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2214
* Fix date aggregation with multiple shards + numerical median computation by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2164
* Fix seven aggregations bugs by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2192
* Mark PointingTo as deprecated/experimental by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2216
* Set restoration status in the sync part of RestoreBackup endpoint by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2187
* Bugfix: Deleting a referenced class panics on GQL schema rebuild by @parkerduckworth in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2189
* Wrap backend error when checking for metadata existence by @redouan-rhazouani in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2200
* Fix HuggingFace module class settings by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2201
* Add support for HuggingFace module error warnings in Weaviate's response by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2202
* Fix issues around explicit nil values for properties by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2207
* Set default for vector cache limit to unlimited by @bobvanluijt in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2217
* Fix nil pointer error on empty aggregate group (accidentally introduced in v1.15.1)
* Fix issue with vector cache limit introduced in v1.15.1 by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2240
* Fix various aggregation issues for non-array data types by @aliszka in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2237
* Fix race conditions when adding objects and in HNSW by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2253
* Fix cross-class near object when using a beacon by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2260
* Fix out-of-range error on old dimensions tracking logic by @etiennedi in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2262
* Fix combining of results with multiple shards by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2263
* Fix module dependency class configuration support by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2278
* Add support for all AWS IAM-based authorizations by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2271
* Fix updating (PATCH) empty arrays by @dirkkul in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2285
* Fix retrieving vector inside cross-reference by @danieldaeschle and@antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2059 and https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2301
* Fix /.well-known/openid-configuration path construction by @antas-marcin in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2307



## New Contributors
* @samos123 made their first contribution in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2306
* @adlerfaulkner made their first contribution in https://github.com/semi-technologies/weaviate/pull/2300
